page.title: 05W.WHITECHURCH FIRST SCHOOL.
page.content: Winterborne Whitechurch Church of England Voluntary Controlled First School is situated in the centre of the village but away from the very busy main road running from Blandford Forum to Dorchester. The present building was built and run by the Church in the middle of the nineteenth century but later, soon after the second world war, full administrative and financial control was handed over to Dorset County Council. Being a V.C.School the School retains a strong link with Salisbury Diocesan Board of Education. Two of the eight School Governors are appointed by the Church, two by the Parish Council, one by the County Council,one parent and one teacher governor plus the Headteacher. The Governors meet at least once a term.
